observation: Pickard Djinis and Pisarri LLP | Washington, DC  Home Attorneys Lee A. Pickard , Partner Emeritus Anthony W. Djinis Mari-Anne Pisarri Paul J. Bazil William D. Edick Peter E. McLeod Craig L. Landauer Aleaha N. Jones Emily J. Gilson Practice Areas Broker-Dealer Regulation Investment Management Practice Securities Litigation and Arbitration NRSRO Regulation Contact Us Home » Specializing in Phone (202) 223-4418 1 Thought leaders in the field of securities regulation and zealous advocates for our clients. Pickard Djinis and Pisarri LLP is a Washington, D.C.-based boutique law firm that has provided a full range of securities regulatory, compliance and enforcement defense services to a wide array of financial industry participants for over thirty years. With a reputation as thought leaders in the field of securities regulation and zealous advocates for our clients, we represent broker-dealers, investment advisers, independent research firms, NRSROs, and providers of financial information and services before the Securities and Exchange Commission, FINRA and other federal, state and self-regulatory bodies. Most of our attorneys were previously associated with the SEC or FINRA/NASD. © 2015–2019 Pickard Djinis and Pisarri LLP WordPress website theme design MightyLittleWebShop.com
